title: Eye of the Storm
description: The body of a Russian prostitute is dumped in a Washington Heights park and Detectives Kelli Storm and Eric Ryder are called to the scene. A note found on the woman's body containing her name and that of a former Russian mobster leads Kelli to an old nemesis.When they confront a Russian Diplomat and the Russian Brotherhood with little success, they seek the help of an FBI contact who aids them in finding a connection between the Diplomat and a corrupt FSN Agent, and uncover a criminal conspiracy between a dangerous Mexican cartel and a notorious New York crime family.As Kelli peels away the layers of death and corruption, she soon finds herself targeted by these organizations, all wanting to eliminate the threat to themselves and their livelihoods.
author: Kenneth Hoss
